column2: Captain! C-Captain! *The camera is tilted in a strange way, Gordon is looking at it bent over unnaturally. A group of scientists is running around behind him in the background. You can hear ruckus. The lab is in total disarray.* Heeeelp!
The stone! It… it came to life!

It came to life and attacked us! We... we can't call for backup! *Loud rumble. Gordon jumps somewhere, disappears from the camera's view, but you can still hear him.* It dented our door and it's stuck, we only have a line to you! Send some soldiers oveeeeer!
Sending some right now… Hold on out there.
Gordon! Gordon! Damn it… Liszkiewicz, come in!
How soon can your people get into the lab?
They're trying, Captain, sir. It won't take long. But the scientists will have to run around dodging the stone for a bit.
Tell your people to do their best. Report to me once it's over.
